sentences.sContent: Its film industry operates in its own curiously hermetic way.
sentences.sCn: 它的电影业以奇特而封闭的方式运作。

synos.tran: [机]密封的；与外界隔绝的；不透气的；炼金术的

words.tran: 密封地，不透气地；炼金术地

trans.tranCn: 密封的, 与外界隔绝的
trans.tranOther: If a container has a hermetic seal, the seal is very tight so that no air can get in or out
